root.name: curveVertex()
root.description: Specifies vertex coordinates for curves. This function may only be called between beginShape() and endShape(). The curveVertex() function is an implementation of Catmull-Rom splines.

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: The x-coordinate of the vertex, either a float or int

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: The y-coordinate of the vertex, either a float or int

parameter.label: z
parameter.description: The z-coordinate of the vertex, either a float or int
